trans-unit.source: Session also supports a special type of session data, called flash messages. A flash message is available only in the current request and the next request. After that, it will be deleted automatically. Flash messages are particularly useful for displaying confirmation messages. To use flash messages, simply call methods such as setFlash(), getFlash().
trans-unit.target: 会话还支持一种特殊的会话数据，称为Flash消息。即时消息仅在当前请求和下一个请求中可用。之后，它将被自动删除。 Flash消息对于显示确认消息特别有用。要使用Flash消息，只需调用诸如setFlash（），getFlash（）之类的方法。

trans-unit.source: Session can be extended to support customized session storage. To do so, override $useCustomStorage so that it returns true, and override these methods with the actual logic about using custom storage: openSession(), closeSession(), readSession(), writeSession(), destroySession() and gcSession().
trans-unit.target: 可以扩展会话以支持定制的会话存储。为此，重写$ useCustomStorage使其返回true，并使用有关使用自定义存储的实际逻辑重写这些方法：openSession（），closeSession（），readSession（），writeSession（），destroySession（）和gcSession（）。

trans-unit.source: Sessions and Cookies
trans-unit.target: Sessions和Cookies

trans-unit.source: Sessions and cookies allow data to be persisted across multiple user requests. In plain PHP you may access them through the global variables $_SESSION and $_COOKIE, respectively. Yii encapsulates sessions and cookies as objects and thus allows you to access them in an object-oriented fashion with additional useful enhancements.
trans-unit.target: 会话和cookie允许数据在多个用户请求之间持久保存。在普通的PHP中，您可以分别通过全局变量 $_SESSION 和 $_COOKIE 访问它们。Yii将会话和cookie封装为对象，从而使您可以通过面向对象的方式访问它们并进行其他有用的增强。

trans-unit.source: Shortcut for Any-Latin; Latin-ASCII; [\u0080-\uffff] remove transliteration rule. The rule is loose, letters will be transliterated with the characters of Basic Latin Unicode Block. For example: 获取到 どちら Українська: ґ,є, Српска: ђ, њ, џ! ¿Español? will be transliterated to huo qu dao dochira Ukrainska: g,e, Srpska: d, n, d! Espanol? Used in transliterate(). For detailed information see unicode normalization forms
trans-unit.target: Any-Latin; Latin-ASCII; [\u0080-\uffff] remove 快捷方式；拉丁字母ASCII; [\ u0080- \ uffff]删除音译规则。规则很宽松，字母将被基本拉丁Unicode块的字符音译。例如： 获取到 どちら Українська: ґ,є, Српска: ђ, њ, џ! ¿Español? 将音译为“ huo qu dao dochira Ukrainska: g,e, Srpska: d, n, d! Espanol? 用于transliterate（）。有关详细信息，请参见Unicode规范化表格

trans-unit.source: Shortcut for Any-Latin; Latin-ASCII transliteration rule. The rule is medium, letters will be transliterated to characters of Latin-1 (ISO 8859-1) ASCII table. For example: 获取到 どちら Українська: ґ,є, Српска: ђ, њ, џ! ¿Español? will be transliterated to huo qu dao dochira Ukrainsʹka: g,e, Srpska: d, n, d! ¿Espanol? Used in transliterate(). For detailed information see unicode normalization forms
trans-unit.target: Any-Latin; Latin-ASCII 快捷方式；拉丁ASCII音译规则。规则是中等的，字母将被音译为Latin-1（ISO 8859-1）ASCII表的字符。例如： 获取到 どちら Українська: ґ,є, Српска: ђ, њ, џ! ¿Español? 将音译为 huo qu dao dochira Ukrainsʹka: g,e, Srpska: d, n, d! ¿Espanol? 用于transliterate（）。有关详细信息，请参见Unicode规范化表格

trans-unit.source: Shortcut for Any-Latin; NFKD transliteration rule. The rule is strict, letters will be transliterated with the closest sound-representation chars. The result may contain any UTF-8 chars. For example: 获取到 どちら Українська: ґ,є, Српска: ђ, њ, џ! ¿Español? will be transliterated to huò qǔ dào dochira Ukraí̈nsʹka: g̀,ê, Srpska: đ, n̂, d̂! ¿Español? Used in transliterate(). For detailed information see unicode normalization forms
trans-unit.target: Any-Latin; NFKD 快捷方式；NFKD音译规则。规则很严格，字母将与最接近的声音表示字符一起音译。结果可能包含任何UTF-8字符。例如： 获取到 どちら Українська: ґ,є, Српска: ђ, њ, џ! ¿Español? 将音译为 huò qǔ dào dochira Ukraí̈nsʹka: g̀,ê, Srpska: đ, n̂, d̂! ¿Español? 用于transliterate（）。有关详细信息，请参见Unicode规范化表格

trans-unit.source: Similar to the default route of the application, there is also a default route for modules, so for example if there is a user module and the request is parsed into the route user the module's defaultRoute is used to determine the controller. By default the controller name is default. If no action is specified in defaultRoute, the defaultAction property of the controller is used to determine the action. In this example, the full route would be user/default/index.
trans-unit.target: 与应用程序的默认路由类似，模块也有默认路由，因此，例如，如果存在 user 模块，并且请求被解析为路由 user ，则使用模块的defaultRoute确定控制器。默认情况下，控制器名称为 default 。如果defaultRoute中未指定任何操作，则控制器的defaultAction属性用于确定操作。在此示例中，完整路由为 user/default/index 。

trans-unit.source: Since 2.0.11 foreign key column names for junction tables are fetched from table schema. In case table isn't defined in schema, or the primary key isn't set or is composite, default name id is used.
trans-unit.target: 从2.0.11开始，从表架构中获取联结表的外键列名称。如果未在架构中定义表，或者未设置主键或该键为复合键，则使用默认名称 id 。

trans-unit.source: Since 2.0.11 you may set defaultDuration value in your cache component configuration if you prefer a custom cache duration over the default unlimited duration. This will allow you not to pass custom duration parameter to set() each time.
trans-unit.target: 从2.0.11开始，如果您希望自定义缓存持续时间超过默认的无限持续时间，则可以在缓存组件配置中设置defaultDuration值。这将使您不必每次都将自定义 duration 参数传递给set（）。

trans-unit.source: Since 2.0.11, foreignKey keyword accepts a second parameter, separated by whitespace. It accepts the name of the related column for the foreign key generated. If no second parameter is passed, the column name will be fetched from table schema. If no schema exists, primary key isn't set or is composite, default name id will be used.
trans-unit.target: 从2.0.11开始， foreignKey 关键字接受第二个参数，以空格分隔。它接受所生成外键的相关列的名称。如果没有传递第二个参数，将从表模式中获取列名。如果不存在任何模式，未设置主键或该键为复合键，则将使用默认名称 id 。

trans-unit.source: Since version 2.0.10 UrlManager can be configured to use UrlNormalizer for dealing with variations of the same URL, for example with and without a trailing slash. Because technically http://example.com/path and http://example.com/path/ are different URLs, serving the same content for both of them can degrade SEO ranking. By default normalizer collapses consecutive slashes, adds or removes trailing slashes depending on whether the suffix has a trailing slash or not, and redirects to the normalized version of the URL using permanent redirection. The normalizer can be configured globally for the URL manager or individually for each rule - by default each rule will use the normalizer from URL manager. You can set UrlRule::$normalizer to false to disable normalization for particular URL rule.
trans-unit.target: 从版本2.0.10 开始，可以将UrlManager配置为使用UrlNormalizer来处理同一URL的变体，例如带有或不带有尾部斜杠。由于从技术上来说 http://example.com/path 和 http://example.com/path/ 是不同的URL，因此为它们提供相同的内容可能会降低SEO排名。默认情况下，规范化器折叠连续的斜杠，根据后缀是否具有尾部斜杠添加或删除尾部斜杠，并使用永久重定向重定向到URL的规范化版本。可以为URL管理器全局配置规范器，也可以为每个规则分别配置规范器-默认情况下，每个规则都将使用URL管理器中的规范器。您可以将UrlRule :: $ normalizer设置为 false 以禁用特定URL规则的标准化。

trans-unit.source: Some Web servers have a special file sending support called X-Sendfile. The idea is to redirect the request for a file to the Web server which will directly serve the file. As a result, the Web application can terminate earlier while the Web server is sending the file. To use this feature, you may call the yii\web\Response::xSendFile(). The following list summarizes how to enable the X-Sendfile feature for some popular Web servers:
trans-unit.target: 一些Web服务器具有称为X-Sendfile的特殊文件发送支持。这个想法是将对文件的请求重定向到直接为文件提供服务的Web服务器。结果，Web应用程序可以在Web服务器发送文件时更早终止。要使用此功能，您可以调用yii \ web \ Response :: xSendFile（）。下面的列表总结了如何为某些流行的Web服务器启用 X-Sendfile 功能：

trans-unit.source: Some cache storage, such as MemCache, APC, support retrieving multiple cached values in a batch mode, which may reduce the overhead involved in retrieving cached data. The APIs multiGet() and multiAdd() are provided to exploit this feature. In case the underlying cache storage does not support this feature, it will be simulated.
trans-unit.target: 某些缓存存储（例如MemCache，APC）支持以批处理方式检索多个缓存的值，这可以减少检索缓存的数据所涉及的开销。提供了API multiGet（）和multiAdd（）以利用此功能。如果基础缓存存储不支持此功能，将对其进行仿真。

trans-unit.source: Some caches (such as memcache, apc) allow retrieving multiple cached values at the same time, which may improve the performance. In case a cache does not support this feature natively, this method will try to simulate it.
trans-unit.target: 有些缓存(如memcache、apc)允许同时检索多个缓存值,这可能会提高性能。如果一个缓存不支持这个功能,本方法将尝试模拟它。

trans-unit.source: Some caching storage has size limitation. For example, memcache limits the maximum size of each entry to be 1MB. Therefore, if the size of a query result exceeds this limit, the caching will fail.
trans-unit.target: 一些缓存存储有大小限制。例如,memcache将每个条目的最大大小限制为1MB。因此,如果查询结果的大小超过这个限制,缓存将失败。

trans-unit.source: Some large applications have very complex application configurations which are divided into many smaller configuration files. If this is the case, consider caching the whole configuration array and loading it directly from cache before creating the application instance in the entry script.
trans-unit.target: 一些大型应用程序具有非常复杂的应用程序配置，这些配置分为许多较小的配置文件。如果是这种情况，请考虑缓存整个配置数组，然后直接在缓存中加载它，然后再在入口脚本中创建应用程序实例。

trans-unit.source: Some modules may need to be run for every request. The debug module is such an example. To do so, list the IDs of such modules in the bootstrap property of the application.
trans-unit.target: 某些模块可能需要针对每个请求运行。所述调试模块是这样一个例子。为此，请在应用程序的bootstrap属性中列出此类模块的ID 。

To avoid writing the same default values again, you can call loadDefaultValues() to populate the DB-defined default values into the corresponding Active Record attributes:

trans-unit.source: Some particular mail extensions may benefit from this approach, using single network message etc.
trans-unit.target: 一些特殊的邮件分机可能会从这种方法中受益,使用单一的网络消息等。

trans-unit.source: Some validations can only be done on the server-side, because only the server has the necessary information. For example, to validate if a username is unique or not, it is necessary to check the user table on the server-side. You can use AJAX-based validation in this case. It will trigger an AJAX request in the background to validate the input while keeping the same user experience as the regular client-side validation.
trans-unit.target: 有些验证只能在服务器端进行,因为只有服务器有必要的信息。例如,要验证一个用户名是否是唯一的,就必须在服务器端检查用户表。在这种情况下,你可以使用基于AJAX的验证。它将在后台触发一个AJAX请求来验证输入,同时保持与常规客户端验证相同的用户体验。

trans-unit.source: Some validators may support additional error messages to more precisely describe different causes of validation failures. For example, the number validator supports tooBig and tooSmall to describe the validation failure when the value being validated is too big and too small, respectively. You may configure these error messages like configuring other properties of validators in a validation rule.
trans-unit.target: 一些验证器可能支持其他错误消息，以更精确地描述验证失败的不同原因。例如，数字验证器支持tooBig和tooSmall来分别描述当验证的值太大和太小时验证失败。您可以配置这些错误消息，例如在验证规则中配置验证器的其他属性。

trans-unit.source: Some widgets can take a block of content which should be enclosed between the invocation of yii\base\Widget::begin() and yii\base\Widget::end(). trans-unit.source: Sometimes you may want to "fix" incorrect/incompatible asset file paths used in multiple asset bundles. For example, bundle A uses jquery.min.js version 1.11.1, and bundle B uses jquery.js version 2.1.1. trans-unit.source: Test-Driven Development (TDD) and Behavior-Driven Development (BDD) are approaches of developing software by describing behavior of a piece of code or the whole feature as a set of scenarios or tests before writing actual code and only then creating the implementation that allows these tests to pass verifying that intended behavior is achieved.
trans-unit.target: 测试驱动开发(TDD)和行为驱动开发(BDD)是开发软件的方法,在编写实际代码之前,将一段代码或整个功能的行为描述为一组场景或测试,然后创建允许这些测试通过的实现,以验证预期行为的实现。

trans-unit.source: Testing is an important part of software development. Whether we are aware of it or not, we conduct testing continuously. For example, when we write a class in PHP, we may debug it step by step or simply use echo or die statements to verify the implementation works according to our initial plan. In the case of a web application, we're entering some test data in forms to ensure the page interacts with us as expected.
trans-unit.target: 测试是软件开发的重要组成部分。不管我们是否意识到，我们都会不断进行测试。例如，当我们用PHP编写类时，我们可以逐步调试它，或者简单地使用 echo 或 die 语句来验证实现是否符合我们的初始计划。对于Web应用程序，我们以表格形式输入一些测试数据，以确保页面按预期与我们交互。

trans-unit.source: That is, enclose content generation logic in a pair of beginCache() and endCache() calls. If the content is found in the cache, beginCache() will render the cached content and return false, thus skip the content generation logic. Otherwise, your content generation logic will be called, and when endCache() is called, the generated content will be captured and stored in the cache.
trans-unit.target: 也就是说，将内容生成逻辑包含在一对beginCache（）和endCache（）调用中。如果在缓存中找到内容，则beginCache（）将呈现缓存的内容并返回 false ，从而跳过内容生成逻辑。否则，将调用您的内容生成逻辑，并且在调用endCache（）时，将捕获所生成的内容并将其存储在缓存中。

trans-unit.source: That's the basic idea. One can say that logging user out is nothing serious, but bad guys can do much more, using this idea. Imagine that some website has an URL http://an.example.com/purse/transfer?to=anotherUser&amount=2000. Accessing it using GET request, causes transfer of $2000 from authorized user account to user anotherUser. We know, that browser will always send GET request to load an image, so we can modify code to accept only POST requests on that URL. Unfortunately, this will not save us, because an attacker can put some JavaScript code instead of <img> tag, which allows to send POST requests on that URL.
trans-unit.target: 这是基本思想。可以说，注销用户并没有什么大不了的，但是坏家伙可以利用这一想法做更多的事情。假设某个网站的URL为 http://an.example.com/purse/transfer?to=anotherUser&amount=2000 。使用GET请求访问它，将导致$ 2000从授权用户帐户转移到用户 anotherUser 。我们知道，浏览器将始终发送GET请求以加载图像，因此我们可以修改代码以仅接受该URL上的POST请求。不幸的是，这不能挽救我们，因为攻击者可以放置一些JavaScript代码而不是 <img> 标签，该标签允许在该URL上发送POST请求。

trans-unit.source: The "Entity Tag" (or ETag for short) header use a hash to represent the content of a page. If the page is changed, the hash will be changed as well. By comparing the hash kept on the client-side with the hash generated on the server-side, the cache may determine whether the page has been changed and should be re-transmitted.
trans-unit.target: “实体标签”（或简称为 ETag ）标头使用哈希表示网页的内容。如果页面被更改，则哈希也将被更改。通过将保留在客户端的哈希值与在服务器端生成的哈希值进行比较，缓存可以确定页面是否已更改并且应该重新发送。

trans-unit.source: The "data" attribute is specially handled when it is receiving an array value. In this case, the array will be "expanded" and a list data attributes will be rendered. For example, if 'data' => ['id' => 1, 'name' => 'yii'], then this will be rendered: data-id="1" data-name="yii". Additionally 'data' => ['params' => ['id' => 1, 'name' => 'yii'], 'status' => 'ok'] will be rendered as: data-params='{"id":1,"name":"yii"}' data-status="ok".
trans-unit.target: 接收数组值时，将特别处理“数据”属性。在这种情况下，数组将被“扩展”，并且将呈现列表数据属性。例如，如果 'data' => ['id' => 1, 'name' => 'yii'] ，则将呈现此 data-id="1" data-name="yii" ：data-id =“ 1” data-name =“ yii”。另外， 'data' => ['params' => ['id' => 1, 'name' => 'yii'], 'status' => 'ok'] 将被呈现为： data-params='{"id":1,"name":"yii"}' data-status="ok" 。

trans-unit.source: The isolation level to use for this transaction. This can be one of READ_UNCOMMITTED, READ_COMMITTED, REPEATABLE_READ and SERIALIZABLE but also a string containing DBMS specific syntax to be used after SET TRANSACTION ISOLATION LEVEL. If not specified (null) the isolation level will not be set explicitly and the DBMS default will be used.

trans-unit.source: The basePath property is often used to derive other important paths (e.g. the runtime path). For this reason, a path alias named @app is predefined to represent this path. Derived paths may then be formed using this alias (e.g. @app/runtime to refer to the runtime directory).

trans-unit.source: The basePath property specifies the root directory of an application. It is the directory that contains all protected source code of an application system. Under this directory, you normally will see sub-directories such as models, views, and controllers, which contain source code corresponding to the MVC pattern.

trans-unit.source: The yii\base\Theme::$pathMap property governs how view files should be replaced. It takes an array of key-value pairs, where the keys are the original view paths to be replaced and the values are the corresponding themed view paths. The replacement is based on partial match: if a view path starts with any key in the pathMap array, that matching part will be replaced with the corresponding array value. Using the above configuration example, because @app/views/site/about.php partially matches the key @app/views, it will be replaced as @app/themes/basic/site/about.php.
trans-unit.target: 该警予\基地\主题:: $路径映射属性控制视图文件应该如何进行更换。它采用一组键值对，其中键是要替换的原始视图路径，而值是相应的主题视图路径。替换基于部分匹配：如果视图路径以pathMap数组中的任何键开头，则该匹配部分将替换为相应的数组值。使用上面的配置示例，由于 @app/views/site/about.php 部分匹配键 @app/views ，它将被替换为 @app/themes/basic/site/about.php 。

trans-unit.source: The categories property takes an array consisting of message category names or patterns. A target will only process messages whose category can be found or match one of the patterns in this array. A category pattern is a category name prefix with an asterisk * at its end. A category name matches a category pattern if it starts with the same prefix of the pattern. For example, yii\db\Command::execute and yii\db\Command::query are used as category names for the log messages recorded in the yii\db\Command class. They both match the pattern yii\db\*.
trans-unit.target: 所述类别属性采用由消息类别名称或图案的阵列。目标将仅处理其类别可以找到或与该数组中的模式之一匹配的消息。类别模式是类别名称前缀，其末尾带有星号 * 。如果类别名称以相同的模式前缀开头，则它与类别模式匹配。例如， yii\db\Command::execute 和 yii\db\Command::query 用作yii \ db \ Command类中记录的日志消息的类别名称。它们都与 yii\db\* 模式匹配。

trans-unit.source: The error handler adjusts the error display according to the value of the constant YII_DEBUG. trans-unit.source: The yii\web\User::login() method sets the identity of the current user to the yii\web\User. If session is enabled, it will keep the identity in the session so that the user authentication status is maintained throughout the whole session. If cookie-based login (i.e. "remember me" login) is enabled, it will also save the identity in a cookie so that the user authentication status can be recovered from the cookie as long as the cookie remains valid.
trans-unit.target: 所述YII \幅\用户::登录（）方法将当前用户的身份YII \网络\用户。如果启用了 session ，它将在会话中保留身份，以便在整个会话中保持用户身份验证状态。如果启用了基于cookie的登录（即“记住我”登录），则还将身份存储在cookie中，以便只要cookie保持有效，就可以从cookie中恢复用户身份验证状态。

trans-unit.source: The Connection component supports load balancing and failover between slaves. When performing a read query for the first time, the Connection component will randomly pick a slave and try connecting to it. If the slave is found "dead", it will try another one. If none of the slaves is available, it will connect to the master. By configuring a server status cache, a "dead" server can be remembered so that it will not be tried again during a certain period of time.
trans-unit.target: 所述 Connection 部件支持负载平衡和故障转移从站之间。首次执行读取查询时， Connection 组件将随机选择一个从属并尝试连接到该从属。如果发现从站“死”，它将尝试另一个。如果没有任何一个从站可用，它将连接到主站。通过配置服务器状态缓存，可以记住“死”服务器，以便在一定时间内不会再次尝试。

trans-unit.source: The GET parameter view tells yii\web\ViewAction which view is requested. The action will then look for this view under the directory @app/views/site/pages. You may configure yii\web\ViewAction::$viewPrefix to change the directory for searching these views.
trans-unit.target: 该 GET 参数 view 告诉警予\网络\ ViewAction这一哪种观点被请求。然后，该操作将在目录 @app/views/site/pages 下寻找该视图。您可以配置yii \ web \ ViewAction :: $ viewPrefix来更改用于搜索这些视图的目录。

trans-unit.target: 在 Last-Modified 头使用时间戳来指示该页面已被修改，因为客户端缓存它。
